snippet: Spain begins its quest for a third straight European Championship title against the Czech Republic, while host France also escaped with a relatively unthreatening group in Saturday’s draw.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Spain, France, and World Cup winner Germany get favorable draws in opening round of 2016's European Championship; other soccer scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Spain begins its quest for a third straight European Championship title against the Czech Republic, while host France also escaped with a relatively unthreatening group in Saturday’s draw.

headline.main: Spain and France Get Favorable Draws
headline.print_headline: Spain and France Get Favorable Draws
